DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effect glucagon-like peptide receptor 1 agonist , liraglutide , insulin secretion . Study hypothesis : effect liraglutide insulin release may change repeat administration . The effect liraglutide insulin release test use grade glucose infusion test ( GGIT ) healthy volunteer . GGIT perform without medication repeat 12 hour first dose liraglutide 3 week treatment liraglutide .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Repeated Administration Liraglutide Insulinogenic Indices
DOC.criteria: Weight 50100 kg Chronic disease Concomitant drug use Pregnancy lactation Fasting glucose > 6 mmol/L .
